description: Develops material studied in LAWS3101 in the context of specific taxpayers. The course is based on the lifecycle of a business, in particular the taxation of business structures including partnerships, trusts and companies. Advanced areas of capital gains tax and goods & services tax plus international tax issues, tax administration and superannuation topics are also covered.
incompatible: COMM3207 or 7205 or LAWS5145 or 7014 or 7145
restricted: Not to be studied by LLB(Hons)(#64), LLB(Hons)(#48), LLB, LLB (Graduate Entry), LLB(Hons) duals and LLB dual programs
